info.name: Google.com - Black and Blue (0.7a)
info.description:
This theme contains the following:

Wallpaper: DARK SOUL by filter1876 on DeviantArt.

Letter Links: Blue.

Color of funds: conbinacion table black.

Descriptions of links: White.

Style sub-menus: border-radius box-shadow + +-moz-linear-gradient.

Buttons: Blue gradient.
info.additionalInfo:
Browser: Mozilla Firefox

This style has been created on a netbook with a resolution of 1024x600, for this reason is that it can be different in resolutions of 1024x768 or higher.
